text: Richard Lowry (; born 1968) is an American journalist and political commentator. He is the editor in chief of National Review. ==Life== Lowry was born in 1968. After graduating high school, he started working as an assistant for Charles Krauthaumer. In 1992, Lowry started working for William F. Buckley Jr. at National Review. In 1997, he became editor. Lowry has praised Ron DeSantis for how he handled Covid. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American journalists Category:American political commentators
title: Rich Lowry
